title: Nobody's children
brief_description: Looks at the issue of homelessness and youth in Australia. Part One called “No place like home” examines the growing underclass of alienated and dispossessed children in Australia. Part Two, entitled “Making it work”, looks at the effect of the collapsed youth job market on kids locked out of the workforce and at school.
